title: Stand Firm In Your "Yes" to God
itunes:title: Stand Firm In Your "Yes" to God
description:
We’ve all had moments when we said no to something God was asking us to do. The good news is, God is not going to hold that no against you. When He asks again, make up your mind to give Him your yes. When you get in agreement with God, there’s no limit to what He can do in your life.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
